Reviews.Title: “Nice family weekend”
Reviews.Author: ArleenL
Reviews.Content: Spend the 2 nights at Oceanside Inn with the family. Spacious room overlooking the beach, very clean. Staff was friendly and accommodating. Pool nice added bonus was the Tiki Bar. Will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice night away, spur of the moment trip.”
Reviews.Author: keithsnumber2
Reviews.Content: Super nice staff. The bartender makes one of the best long island ice teas I have had. We had a king room with an ocean view on the fourth floor. Clean room and pool, no smells, simple continental breakfast. I wish that there was a balcony, however, the whole wall of our room was a huge window. Wi-fi was only guaranteed on the first floor and when we tried to use our device on the first floor we could not connect long enough to accomplish the task we were trying to accomplish. Would stay here again with or without the kids. Hubby says that they definately know how to take care of their guests and make you feel welcome. The cleanliness is outstanding.

Reviews.Title: “enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: s C
Reviews.Content: just a quick trip to daytona, had an ocean side room on the 3rd floor that was very nice. free dvd rentals as part of the amenities, good for the 'bored' kids. was an older hotel but in good shape and kept well. hidden taxes were a bummer but not that bad. would stay there again without a doubt. they did not tell us bout the $50 deposit fee that is charged to your card upon check in until you get there. over all a good place to stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: Dana C
Reviews.Content: You get everything from a tiki bar to exercise equipment here! DVD rentals made it nice for my daughter. The pool was big and everything was clean. The room was very nice and tidy as well. We were very happy with our choice to stay at this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “We stayed on the beach!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: kimmitch
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel as part of a timeshare promotion of 3 days and 2 nights. The room we occupied on the first night was clean but very cramped.The service was excellent. The safe in our room did not work. Once reported, service arrived within minutes. The man was pleasant and the problem resolved immediately. I was able to upgrade for the 2nd night to an oceanfront room. The room, while furnished with older furniture, was clean, spacious, and had a wonderful view of the ocean (but no balcony). The continental breakfast was not the best I have ever had, but it was better than some others we experienced. My children were able to access wi-fi without any glitch. We did not spend much more than "sleep" and shower time in the room as we were busy with enjoying Daytona and area. We did not spend much time in the lobby either than as the route to the ocean. Parking was located next to the hotel and we always found a spot in the garage, out of the sun, but close to the entrance. This was the first time I had encountered a policy limiting towels--we had to turn in used towels to get an equal number of clean towels. My children enjoyed the pool without any complaint. Overall, while the amenities were not 5 star, they exceeded my expectations for what I could afford. All of the employees that we had contact with were friendly and helpful. The location definitely compensated for any deficiency in amenities. We stayed "on the beach" and not several blocks away!!! I would definitely choose a beachfront room for my stay if I ever have the opportunity to return to Daytona Beach again. Of all of the hotels we stayed at on this trip, this one excelled in service, parking, and location.

Reviews.Title: “Do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: msdrea32
Reviews.Content: We bought a deal from KGB Deals for $79 for 4 days and 3 nights when we arrived at the welcome center they gave us a set of keys to a room 622 and offered us a time share so to kill time we did it. We were told we could go straight to the room but we stopped by the front desk just to make sure the room was ready. It was not we were switched to 412 and asked to pay $50.00 resort fee which was supposed to be included from KGB. We got out of that once getting to the room the air didn't work the king size bed was sunk in the middle that gave us back aches the wi fi didn't work. We were moved again to 410 better air bed still broke in half wifi worked sometime. Breakfast is a joke cereal and hard danish. Hot tub doesn't work and the pool is old. Wi Fi only works in the lobby, They have several bars that they have drink specials posted for that never open up. The staff has a terrible attitude and are very rude and unfamilar with customer service. Will never stay there ever again. I did enjoy Joe's Crab shack and the rest of Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “VERY PLEASANT PLACE.”
Reviews.Author: terry12338
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel july 2012 for 2 nights with my husband, after 4 long days with all the fam at Orlando. Went i first saw the place wonder how would it be to stay here, been that I have timeshares it was a little uncomfortable to stay in a place like this. For my surprise the place was great, they gave us a very nice room looking to the pool and ocean, very quite, the employees were very nice and helpful, can complain, had a great time with husband, i wish I could it stay longer, had breakfast out every morning and Dinner. NO REGRETS. If I have to used it again I will. The beach is great,even the swimming pool was nice, no body bothers with anyone.Had a few nice drinks by the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I Expected!”
Reviews.Author: PrPonce
Reviews.Content: I stayed there this past July 2012 with my family for 3 nights.A timeshare company offered me to stay there, to try it, not for free,not even cheap,but i took it thinking that they will treat me as a guest and show me the best of their company`s hotel and ammenities.Saddly,I found that this wasn`t what i expected.It`s an old hotel with old appearance from the interior of the room to the outside.Surely was better than Calypso Cay room ,but not what i expected.I don`t like timeshare people that offer you something,make you stay in an old hotel and then try to show you other great resort thinking that you are dumb and you will buy their stuff,please!.People deserve respect.Don`t try to sell using those tricks,shame on you!. The continental breakfast is so bad that not even my dog can eat it,please!The only good thing about this old hotel is the closeness to the Daytona beach- it is behind the hotel.An old hotel means old carpets,bad odors,stains,rust and all the bad things that all old hotels have.If you just like to be close to the beach,then this hotel is for you.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Susann86
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews i almost cancelled my booking.. So glad i didn't! Friendly staff. Our room was big, clean and some oceanview! We didn't have big towels in our room, went down to the front desk, they fixed it right away. There's a kitchen as well in the room so you can make ur own food. I'd stay here again! (We had room 910, top floor)

Reviews.Title: “This place is nasty. Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Hello1995
Reviews.Content: We checked in and when we got in the hall way from the elevator is smelled. The room was not much better. The tub was dirty and the bathroom needed to be painted. The room needs to be cleaned out then painted and carpet replaced replaced the furniture with new stuff. However when you leave the property and go to the beach and face the ocean with your back to the hotel, it's a nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Hasn't been updated in years”
Reviews.Author: Expat2005SA
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for inexpensive accommodation and not fussy about decor then this place is okay. Its clean but very outdated.

Reviews.Title: “Poor staff service, bugs in room, dirty smell”
Reviews.Author: campbellhale
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 5 days, on the second day we found a roach in our room. We complained to management, nothing was done. We were told it was an isolated incident, so imagine my surprise 2 days later when i found another one 3 times the size of the first one. Our room always smelled moldy/stale. The air conditioner sounded like a jet taking off when it kicked on and kept waking us up. The clerk that checked us in was really rude, and almost every time i went to the front desk she was there still rude as ever. We also had to pay a resort fee, and this hotel so didn't warrant paying an extra fee for anything. I was very disappointed with our stay. We will not be returning to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Dirt cheap, but still overpriced”
Reviews.Author: TeddyBearFace
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here when in a bind and needing a place to stay overnight before we knew how long or if we'd be staying in Daytona Beach. We picked it because we got there late and were leaving early, so we just wanted something cheap. We got what we deserved. This hotel was disgusting, and included disclaimers stating that they opted out of Florida state laws requiring the cleaning of hotel glasses. Other signs included one at the front desk warning to not open the door for people knocking on your door, as it could be unsolicited intruders. We were both appalled by the notices, and were equally as disgusted by the room. While it actually seemed and appeared clean, we did not trust the bed enough to get under the covers. The inconsistent air conditioning unit made for a miserable night on top of the bedding. Our assumptions that it was dirtier than meets the eye were affirmed by the unidentified bug in our bathroom, as well as our checkout, when the front desk was called by another guest. He was complaining about the bugs in his room, only to be met by a nonchalant reaction offering to spray the room when he and his family were out. I would never stay in this hotel again, and I would suggest that, if your budget allows, you don't either.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Tony W
Reviews.Content: My name is Tony W, I took my two kids on a Fla vacation last week and we decided to stay at this Hotel. what a bad idea that was. when I went to check in they couldn't find my reservation,so they put me in a different room than I wanted. I reserved a King room that looked very nice from the pictures on line but I ended up with just a plain room,very small . but I was charged the rate for the king room. after three of our six day stay they moved us to a different room but still not the king room. the wifi didn't work in the lobby, the pool had a salt water filter system on it so the pool was nasty and in the six days we stayed it was not cleaned once. the people at the front desk was rude to everyone they spoke to. this was the worst hotel I have ever stayed in. we go to Fla every year and this was the first time and the last time I will ever stay here. when I went to check out they told me that there whole system was down and I would need to wait four hours to check out, I could not wait that long so I choose to leave, when I ask them to mail my invoice to me they said that they could not do that. and as of yet I don't know when I will get credit for my $50.00 deposit that I was charged above the room rate. the pictures on there web site are out dated this hotel is in very bad condition, my advice to all would be to pass this place up and find some other place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't pay me to go again!”
Reviews.Author: dave1027
Reviews.Content: I won a 3 night stay here through an auction at my 9 year old's elementary school. We had to go "check in" at some welcome center where they signed us up for a hour & a half sales pitch to join their travel company for $13000. We were handed deadbolt keys to the room they owned in the hotel & told to go there & ask at the front desk if that room was clean. We went to the hotel & asked the girl at the front desk if that room was clean & she said yes. My wife asked where the continental breakfast was served & the manager/witch said "you don't get that" because "you're not really guests". I was really close to driving back home right then but I had a 9 year old girl with me. The next day after swimming in the pool, I wnet up to the desk & asked for pool towels & guess what? I was told "you don't get towels & I said "because I'm not really a guest?" The room was not cleaned for 3 days, no towels, no sheets, nothing. DO NOT GO HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Katie W
Reviews.Content: Hotel in a great location but rooms have not been updated in quite a long time. Beds are old an uncomfortable. Furniture is stained. Wall had holes in it. Great service as well though.

Reviews.Title: “dated but clean”
Reviews.Author: cincyedc
Reviews.Content: nice cooperative staff. Allowed us to change our room to twin beds easily Clean dated

Reviews.Title: “poorly maintained and not as advertised”
Reviews.Author: fugawe09
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a relaxing beach vacation. Maybe I should have known better than Daytona Beach in general... but... the professional photos are taken from creative angles and probably photoshopped a bit. It conveniently crops out the enormous new resort next door that blocks the ocean view on one side. I had a reservation for a king bed with an ocean view. I show up to a room with two double beds and a view of the parking garage - and only the parking garage. Not even city view. Parking garage view. Mind you they first told us that we couldn't even park in said garage, that we would have to park across the highway in an abandoned gas station. My girlfriend tried to protest and the lady at the desk blew her off. I had to really force the issue and got a parking pass and new room. Note that all of the photos on their website are of "ocean front" rooms while most of the rooms are actually "ocean view" on the side of the hotel. And then there's the beach itself. True, the hotel has no control over it, but the pictures of a serene beach are totally inaccurate. In real life it is packed with big wheel Jeeps parked bumper to bumper for as far as you can see. When I was there, the hotel itself was playing host to a New Jersey couple's wedding - and there was enough drama for a reality TV show. Late night yelling, vomit in the elevator, etc. Again, maybe not entirely the hotel's fault, but that's the clientele that comes here. In terms of maintenance, the furniture is all trashed. It's second-hand from a resort in Orlando. All of it is still stamped with the name of said resort. Part of the parking garage is not useable because the concrete is falling apart. It is literally propped up with 2x4s and caution tape. The housekeeping in the room was sufficient but everything just felt old and abused.

Reviews.Title: “I don't like someone else's poo in my supposedly clean room”
Reviews.Author: Judi D
Reviews.Content: First let me tell you that I read all the reviews and tried to stay in the hotel next door to this one but they were full, so we had to stay here. We went for a Wedding that was taking place at this hotel and all of the other wedding guests stayed here. When I arrived i was checking in and asked to make sure they had my daughters reservation and could we get adjoining rooms, The desk clerk informed me that they didn't have my daughters reservation. They then informed me that there wouldn't be a room for her and her family. I decided to go ahead then and get a suite which they had one left. She told me it would be an additional charge of $50 a night extra. I agreed and said well then my daughter and her family can just sleep in their with me. The suite should be big enough. When I went in to the suite I noticed that it was a bit run down but didn't seem to be dirty. I unpacked my belongings in the bathroom, but when I went to use the bathroom there was someone else's poo in and ON the toilet lid. I went immediatley to the front desk and told them and she offered to have house cleaning come down but the other clerk then informed me that house cleaning was gone. Then she just said SORRY about that! Now I at this point was livid! I went back to the room and had to clean it up myself!!!!!!!! I got to tell you this will never happen again because I won't stand for it. If I had a choice to be placed in another hotel I soooooo would have gone but they were all booked up. Needless to say I will NEVER go back to that place again. They did end up giving us one nights stay for the discounted rate but even at that this place was no good. No balconies in the rooms to enjoy the ocean breezes, no little extras at all. I hope this will help someone else to avoid the same problems that I had here.

Reviews.Title: “Great support and service for our large group!”
Reviews.Author: hlc8
Reviews.Content: This hotel is right on the beach and offers outstanding support and service. Everything we need is provided with a friendly and courteous response. Jose and the kitchen staff provide the best service around. We've been coming here for years, and have never been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “I'd be disappointed if I didn't get a deal”
Reviews.Author: freakyb
Reviews.Content: Looking at crashing for the night after a trip up from Orlando. Got an Orbitz deal and glad I did. Big clean rooms with clean bathrooms. Ocean "view" is a little deceptive. Yes I could "view" it if I stood in the corner of the room. Outside in back of hotel had nice places to sit and watch ocean...and direct access to beach. Overall nice and clean, and if they didn't claim to be ocean view I wouldn't mind the view when I got there...just not what I expected.

Reviews.Title: “Cockroaches”
Reviews.Author: Shellyrubenstien
Reviews.Content: I stayed here as part of a timeshare package. The hotel has a nice pool and is right on the beach, our second night we found & killed 2 cockroaches in the bathroom. The continental breakfast is cereal & danish only. Coffee & juice. There a cafe on site with reasonable prices. Have they're own version on Redbox in lobby, 1 free movie at a time with DVD players in rooms. Beds were uncofortable.

Reviews.Title: “Look around before you book”
Reviews.Author: AnnieOklee
Reviews.Content: Well, first of all we did not get the rooms we thought we had booked. The standard rooms that were available only had one king size bed per room and we had four people per room. So at the time of booking we were upgraded from the $89 ocean view to the $99 ocean front for the $89 price. We were supposed to have 3 rooms together. Room 1 was on the 3rd floor in the front of the building with no view of the water. Room 2 was on the 4th floor and if you stood at the very back edge of the window you could see the ocean only if a wave happened to roll way up on shore. Room 3 was on the 8th floor on the north side and that did have a nice view of the ocean. The bed frame on one of the beds in our room was broken. There was trash from a previous guest under the bed. On the night we checked in, Brittany, the front desk clerk was not very nice or helpful. We needed a crib and she was unable or unwilling to get one saying we would have to wait until the next day. The next morning we spoke with the manager to figure out the room mix up. He was not the friendliest person and told us we did not book a specific room only the room type. Anyway he wasn't very pleasant for being in a service industry. The "Continental Breakfast" is a joke. Stale pastries, fake Cheerio's, raisin bran, watered down OJ, & coffee. The prices at the restaurant are way over the top. Everyone we spoke with wondered what continent they were talking about to call it a continental breakfast. The internet service is poor to below poor. If your lucky enough to get on it boots you off and on continually. We were lucky and guessed the password because they didn't give it to us. One couple I spoke to said that Brittany was a real b**ch to them also. They were so fed up with the lack of internet service and customer service, at the front desk, they were changing hotels. The housekeeping staff was friendly. I think it's the only hotel around without any balconies. There is only one umbrella table by the pool with 4 or 5 chairs. There are a couple picnic tables, one by the pool and one on the yard. I guess it was all the things added together that would make me say I wouldn't stay there again. There are so many hotels to choose from so why should I give them any more business or recommend them to anyone else. Unless the only other option is to stay at one of the little dumpy motels on the other side of the street. Then I guess I'd stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “3 on the border of 4!”
Reviews.Author: Nearandfar23
Reviews.Content: My daughter does competition cheer and during spring break they have a competition at the bandshell. So usually you would think it would be crazy, but they have a great handle on things. The hotel is older, but very well kept up with. We have stayed a few times now and the staff has always been nice and helpful. The beach is right outside and restaurants aren't far at all. I would say that the complimentary breakfast needs a little work, they kinda force you to eat at the hotel restaurant. The pool was nice also. I would recommend it for a quick stay, family friendly.

Reviews.Title: “no continental breakfast just a morning snack”
Reviews.Author: lilouny
Reviews.Content: The continental breakfast was made of a pastry and orange juice with coffee...that's all... Kinda disappointing for the 111$ that we paid for a night... Every guests coming to the breakfast place had the same face on seeing this fake breakfast. The hotel is clean and the rooms too. We could hear everythg in the room next to us which was annoying.

Reviews.Title: “FAMILY REUION”
Reviews.Author: angie t
Reviews.Content: Good trip Family reuion 2010 and 2011. entire family liked it both times. would go back again. staff nice rooms ok inside and outside bar good

Reviews.Title: “PLEASANT EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: Pam B
Reviews.Content: Before my I booked this hotel for my husband and I to spend only two nights, I read a lot of the reviews and had my concerns. Being that it was race week, many of the hotels were booked. I (we) were pleasantly surprised when we walked into the room. Granted, there was no balcony, but the room was very, very clean, very large, included a kitchenette, and for the price, it couldn't be beat. The staff was quite friendly, as well. The breakfast was nothing to rave about, but again, for price, what do you expect? There was an awesome fish tank in the lobby, and checkout was a breeze. I would definitely stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “MOST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK :)!!!”
Reviews.Author: Snflwrchld555
Reviews.Content: I was a bit apprehensive initially with the mixed reviews but didn't have a lot of cash flow and had to spend the night in Daytona...I am definitely glad I found this hotel it was clean, the room was large and had a couch; desk; microwave;fridge;coffee maker; & dishes, you get a movie rental card machine is in the lobby, an it's right on the beach SERIOUSLY all for 95(TAX INCLUDED)!!! Not sure what the bad review people were expecting but I will DEFINATELY be staying here again :)))!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: lorihuntington
Reviews.Content: we stayed in a oceanfront room that the front desk picked for us great roomshe did a awesome job picking it we will stay there again next year the only thing we didnot like was their cont/ breakfast donut juice not acont. breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Good Value & Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: SmokyMountainFinds
Reviews.Content: On an impromptu trip to Daytona Beach we decided to stay for a few days and had the good fortune to stop and check room rates at Oceanside Inn. With the local hotel discount book and the beginning of the off season we were able to book an ocean side suite for less than $70 a night. Our suite included a full eat in kitchen, sitting area with seating for 7, two queen beds, two tv's, plenty of storage space and a large bathroom with dressing area and full closets. We were treated to a wall of windows overlooking the ocean from the 7th floor. Our kids loved this as they could open the windows at night and fall asleep to the sights and sounds of the ocean. The room was clean and well cared for. Beds were newer and very comfortable with plenty of pillows for each bed. The staff went above and beyond in the level of service at all areas. The free breakfast is very basic. Cold cereal, pastries, coffee, juice and milk. The hotel offers a good selection of hot breakfast items at a good value. Kids enjoyed the free DVD rentals offered. The full kitchen was great option for anyone who would like to cook and would offer a huge saving option on food cost. There are ample grocery stores nearby. Access to the beach is just steps out the back door and we liked that it is secured with a child safety lock. Very secure parking area that is well lit. We did notice some roaches on our checkout day and mentioned it to the front desk as we were packing up. Before we left they had someone working on it.

Reviews.Title: “Always An Excellent Stay!”
Reviews.Author: sandandseavacation
Reviews.Content: We stayed in one of the Oceanfront rooms and just loved it. We managed to get the room next door, as well, for our 2 adult children. We had crab and shrimp that we picked up from a Publix market on the beach. What a great way to enjoy the ocean view, eating seafood. I liked the fact that we could slide open the window to enjoy the crashing waves, but we still had comfortable AC while we had our meals. Our kids hiked down the beach every night for some entertainment by the pier. They could have taken the local trolley, but they preferred to walk on the beach. Our room was very comfortable, as always. We had a king bed studio with all the usual amenities, including tv, kitchenette, and sitting chairs for beach watching. We brought our beach gear in the room, so all we had to do was take our food and drinks out of the fridge, grab our gear, and head down to the beach. The hotel is right on a beautiful beach, so there is no need to pack up the car. I enjoyed the basic free breakfast every morning. Coffee, cereals, little donuts, and juice. And, if you want a made to order breakfast, there is a little sit-down restaurant next door! We also liked the covered parking lot, since the sun is so hot in August. The front desk and the manager, James, were very accomodating to all of our requests. We can't wait til next time!

Reviews.Title: “Oceanside Inn is not bad, but would not stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: WPTraveler
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed six nights in late September 2011 as part of a package deal. The room was adequate and the bed was comfortable. There was a microwave and small refrigerator. We were disappointed that there was no balcony and the window did not open. We like to hear the sound of the ocean when we take a beach vacation. The building appears to have been recently updated. The staff was friendly enough but we had to ask several times before housekeeping serviced the room, finally on the fourth day of our stay. The complimentary breakfast was two choices of cereal, orange juice, coffee and danish. This was fine with us; we brought our own fruit to put on the cereal. There is a restaurant with reasonable prices but we did not eat there. There is a mandatory "resort fee" of $5.95 per night to cover DVD rentals and internet access.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Getaway”
Reviews.Author: Andrearf
Reviews.Content: Clean oceanview room, relaxed environment. Unpretentious atmosphere and just enjoyed the pool and beach as much as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Great value right on the beach.”
Reviews.Author: samsidoti
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price and value at Oceanside Inn in Daytona Beach Shores Florida. The Building is clean and right on the beach. Most rooms have an oceanview with micro, refrig, and coffee maker. Even though this is an older property it is well maintained. A fee continental breakfast is included but there is a full service rest. also available.

Reviews.Title: “Not what I expected”
Reviews.Author: eduardo g
Reviews.Content: This hotel needs restoration, everything looks old. Bad smell in halls and room. Breakfast include is a fraud (only cereal and coffee). Room service was done after 3 pm. Poor security, anyone can go and have a nice day at the swimming pool without paying (no bracelets required to be in).

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: taylor m
Reviews.Content: Where do I start? The hotel looks rusty and a bad place to stay.The front desk lady seemed like she was rushing us in the check-in process. We get into the elevator, which smells and is VERY hot. It also stops at every other floor, even if there is no one waiting to get in. It will also go back down some floors, if you are trying to go up. We get out of the slow elevator, and the hallways are HOT! There is no air conditioning in the hallways at all. The rooms were okay. The bed was big. There were no blankets on the bed. We called front desk and they said we had to go back down the slow elevator and get them from the front desk. While down there, we used our "unlimited dvd card" they provided for us. There were not good movie choices at all. So, we picked our dvd, brought it back up the slow smelly elevator and popped it in the dvd player. Little do we know, the remote control was broke. It did not switch to the DVD settings. We called AGAIN. A nice repair man helped us with the remote control. The dvd then worked. Pool was small and seemed dirty. Breakfast was not free. A/C worked very good but made a lot of noise. My boyfriend and I actually chose to walk up the stairs at one point. When we were checking out, the front desk lady gave us the "complementary toothpaste" and splenda packets. It was pathetic.

Reviews.Title: “Wont go back....EVER!”
Reviews.Author: rhondamichelle73
Reviews.Content: If your only concern is money then go ahead....but if you care about cleanliness then pass on by. The bathroom was yucky...there was pubic hair on the towel that was hanging on the towel rack. The towels were all hung perfectly with a pub just laying right on top! How could the maid not have noticed this? Also there was one on the shower handle....OMG!!! The hotel also said they have a continental breakfast....um....yes if you have money they will make you breakfast! One guy that was down there actually called before he made his reservation and they confirmed that they did have a continental breakfast. Good grief! The kiddie pool had grass and weird stuff in it. The tiki bar is hardly ever open. One good thing was that the A/C will freeze you out of there which is awesome to have in Florida....BUT PLEASE PROVIDE AN ACTUAL BLANKET FOR US!!!!!! There was a sheet and a very thin foam blanket on the bed....and laying at the end of the bed looked like a comforter....when I pulled it up....IT WAS ONLY 2 FEET IN LENGTH!!! What am I going to do with that???? Also someone at that hotel needs to look up the dimensions of a "king" size bed...When I booked the room they asked if I wanted a king or 2 queens...I chose king.....That bed was a double....the mattress in my camper is bigger! And it sunk in the middle so me and my husband were miserable! I know that I could go on and on....but I don't wanna get a cramp!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: NYC20th
Reviews.Content: When we arrived at this hotel it was pouring with rain! The lady who checked us in could not have been nicer. She recommended restaurants which would deliver lunch for us. Our room was wonderful. it was quite large and was a corner room with windows on two sides and had a fantastic view of the beach and ocean. We noticed on getting settled that we didn't have any towels but it took less than 5 minutes after we called the front desk for someone to bring a nice stack of towels to our room. We had pizza delivered and ate it while we enjoyed the view. The beds were extremely comfortable and the room was very clean. The bathroom was in excellent shape. We did not try the restaurant but did go down the road to eat at the diner and the food was really good! Our room had a little fridge and a sink an microwave. this would have been very handy if we had been staying longer but we only stayed for one night as an add-on to our Orlando vacation. All the dishes were clean as were all the appliances and the sink. I had read some not very complimentary reviews of this hotel but we thought it was great. It is in a good location, is very clean and comfortable and the staff is very nice. One staff member recommended we take a drive to the nearby lighthouse and we did and had a nice couple of hours. There is a very small resort fee which shouldn't be a big deal. We would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Watch your belongings”
Reviews.Author: freedom124
Reviews.Content: The hotel was just fine and clean..no complaints on that side..and would stay again..other than one big problem. When we came back from the beach, i realized my husbands bed was made and mine was not. We found that very odd..because the maid had been there. The trash was emptied, new shampoo and soap ect. Later that evening i went to pull out my wallet and pay for dinner, only to realize that the cash in my wallet was gone..I realize it was my error to have left my wallet on the bed ( hence why it was not made..this way the maid could say she never saw a wallet ..or touched a wallet ) ..however ..there was no way to prove missing cash. BE VERY CAREFUL WITH YOUR PERSONAL POSSESSIONS..by the way ..the maids name was "Sister " >>Live and learn...and dont be so trusting..

Reviews.Title: “Almost Perfect”
Reviews.Author: EgyptJenn
Reviews.Content: The location was wonderful and we were satisfied with our room, but our a/c was so loud, we had to turn the tv way up to hear anything. We noticed the loud ac noise right away when we entered our room but we decided we would just deal with it; we were already in a good mood and didn't feel like making a big deal out of it. Well at around midnight while we're cuddled in bed drinking a bottle of wine and watching a movie, we have an employee of the hotel knocking on our door saying they were getting noise complaints from the neighbors. I explained the ac situation and the fact that we couldn't hear the tv if we turned it down so he said that he would have to move us! At midnight, we had to get out of bed and compile all of our stuff and move to another room on another floor. Then the dvd player didn't work in that room at first and we were on and off the phone and the guy and he had to come back up to our room to try and figure out how to get it to work. It was very frustrating as it was late and we just wanted to crawl back into bed and finish our movie instead of dealing with all that. Aside from the midnight ordeal, we did enjoy our stay there.

Reviews.Title: “Our 5th year here and counting....”
Reviews.Author: vforce24
Reviews.Content: We live on the other coast in Florida and plan an extended weekend vacation getaway to Daytona Beach every year. This was our 5th year staying at the Oceanside Inn and we are never disappointed. The rooms are always clean and very well stocked. We stayed with a group and against my better judgement went with the group and stayed our 1st 2 nights in Daytona at another place down the road. Yes, it was closer to all of the "action" but boy was I sorry I had done that. The others left and we spent the next 2 nights at Oceanside Inn. We were glad to be "home." The location is great - right on the beach...the price is right....if you just want to hang out at the pool, it is very well kept. The staff is super nice and accommodating. I cannot say anything bad about this place! We love it and will continue to stay here every year when we return!!

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel”
Reviews.Author: jedi42
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in July, the hotel is okay - like a few others in need of an update, The first thing we did notice is the pool is a lot smaller than the picture - which is taken at an angle, thus it filled up quite quick and so did the area surrounding the pool, Pool towels are available at reception and no problems getting fresh ones. Breakfast is very poor, 3 types of cereal & small doughnuts, fruit juice & coffee, opposite the small room where continential b'fast is served you can order a "cooked b'fast" - tried that it wasn't much better and a bit pricey for b'fast, there is a publix not far from this hotel we bought milk,cereal & orange juice (as your room has a fridge) and had a diy b'fast. It has great access for the beach, we walked to the pier which is currently closed for renovations, nearby (to the pier) there is a small shopping mall with a cinema, Bubba Gumps, burger King etc. The hotel offer free DVD hire which was great to come in at night & watch a movie. The Wifi only seemed to work in the reception area. We only stayed for 3 nights but we only seen the bar open once & the Tiki bar at the pool opened about lunch time. All in all the hotel was okay for the money, but I would only go back if there was a really good deal.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for the price!”
Reviews.Author: DebbieHerczeg
Reviews.Content: This was our first time staying in Daytona Beach, FL. The hotel was conveniently located near the Daytona Speedway and, Ponce Inlet. Staff was pleasant and very accomodating to our needs. The room was a typical hotel room, equipped with a microwave and fridge. The room was clean, beds were made daily. Nice size bathroom and plenty of closet space. It had a very large tv in the room, however, the tv was positioned next to the bed so it was uncomfortable watching tv. A better location would be directly in front of the bed where most tv's are located when visiting a hotel. The parking was very convenient, right next to the hotel. The swimming pool was nice and warm. Overall our experience at this hotel was a good one. We would visit again.

Reviews.Title: “We had a fabulous time!”
Reviews.Author: adnerblou
Reviews.Content: On a trip to visit relatives, we stopped for 2 days at this hotel! The Ritz it isn't, its on the wrong side of the "tracks" but we had a fantastic stay! The parking garage was great, the pool and the tiki hut restaurant/bar were awesome. Great burgers and drinks. We bought the kids boogie boards and had a great time in the water. The best! Thanks If you want a large breakfast, go to IHOP its about 2 blocks away!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Beaverj
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay.View was great and staff was fantastic.Arrived really early and Scott got us a room ASAP.Had driven all night to get there.Everyone there was friendly and helpful.Room was very good and comfortable.Location far enough down beach to not be crowded but close enough to be convienent to everything.Older hotel but staff always working to keep it in top notch shape.Only draw backs was the tiki bar closed too early and it did not have a balcony but we knew that up front.When we go back next year we will be staying there again. Thanks again to everyone. John B.

Reviews.Title: “And you call this continental breakfast?”
Reviews.Author: lionking05
Reviews.Content: We stayed there this weekend. Hotel is an older hotel and needs renovation but is clean. The location is good and the ocean view is great. But I would be ashamed of myself if I advertised free continental breakfast and then offer some store bought doughnuts and two types of cereal. Also when the milk is gone, it is gone. No refill or anything. It was ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible! Avoid this hotel like the plague!”
Reviews.Author: stkemp
Reviews.Content: We booked this online through our timeshare company. The description of the room and rates offered vs what was actually delivered was opposite. I paid for an Ocean View Deluxe with a Kitchenette. What I was given at check in was a small room with two beds, half a fridge and a small microwave. The "view" was of the hotel next door and street in front of the hotel. If I strained hard enough through the weather stained windows, I could see very little of the ocean. The mattresses were old and had a huge sag in them. Talk about a back ache the next day. They boast of a pool side Tiki bar that was never open and their regular bar didn't open until later in the evening. You have to wait for a long time to get on the elevator to get to your room. More often than not, you will have to go up to go down or go down to go up. When I confronted the hotel manager about the "bait and switch" on the room, he blamed it on the online websites that offer services they "don't" carry and said I would have to get any refund from them. He at least cancelled the "resort charges" for the movies / amenities that we didn't even use. The free continental breakfast was a choice of cheerios or raisin bran and soggy donuts. That was the only positive experience about the stay at this hotel. We will never go back and highly recommend you avoid this place. My wife and I wonder how in the world it gets "3" stars. I only give it one because that's the lowest I can give.

Reviews.Title: “Worse Ever”
Reviews.Author: DEEDEET
Reviews.Content: My family requested two ajoining rooms because we had kids ages 10 and 15 and wanted them to have their own room. This did not happen. We were seperated. The two rooms that we had were so roach infested that we had to spray down the rooms (yes both rooms) on the first night. Roaches were every where. The second night my daughter was awaken by a roach crawling on her in her bed. That did it. We got up, packed out bags and left. We will never go back there. The hotel could be nice, but the roaches got to go. The elevators need upgrading. They are too slow. The continental breakfast could us some uplifting. Powdered donoughts and raisin brand cereal, not much of a choice. Never again.

Reviews.Title: “Just okay”
Reviews.Author: susanwm
Reviews.Content: There were mostly young familes and singles staying here. Our room was across from the ice machine and you could hear everything going on in the hallway. (people seemed to be getting ice all night long). The bed was not supportive and the pillows lumpy. On the plus side, the common areas were clean.. Even though our room did not face the beach and had no balcony, we could see the ocean from our window. I was glad that they offered a continental breakfast but was disappointed in the selection offered (a choice of 2 cereals, juice, coffee and mini donuts).

Reviews.Title: “Good value, comfortable, some noise problems (slamming doors)”
Reviews.Author: egleview
Reviews.Content: I got this at a discount from Hotel dot com ( their customer service after sales is NIL ) Upon arriving, upgraded with $20 ( a total of $78). The room is spaceious with a kitchenet, microwave, refregerator, toaster, coffeemaker, tv, (free DVDs if you like to see movies of yoru choice), iron and ironing board, a table with two chairs, sofa and a king size bed. This bed has been the most comfortable of the seven hotels that I stayed in last 10 or so days. Not too soft, not too hard; also for the first time I did not have to use my personal pillows! Upon waking up, as soon as I opened the drapes, tadah! A breathetaking Sun rise that you can see right from your bed! This hotel is ten story high, with two elevators. Two small but nice lawns and plenty of louge chairs... The front desk staff ( Charmin ) was extra nice - she even called to see if everything in the room was okay! Maintenance staff is another story. The door does not shut unless you slam it really hard. So I called the reception and she sent over the maintainance guy... His first questions was - how many nights you are staying? ( what does it matter!!! ) He checked the door and said he will need to order parts. ( according to me two drops of oil would have done the trick ) - I told him I do not mind, but if I were the next door neighbor I would be pissed. Guess what! After I went to sleep, bang, bang, bang from both sides of the room. It seems everybody had the same problem! Other than that, it is the BEST VALUE for the dollar....

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprise!”
Reviews.Author: cath_cat77
Reviews.Content: For the price I paid, I was pleasantly surprised because the staff was extremely helpful and courteous. The room was clean and comfortable! We checked out at regular time 11am and the hotel allowed us to stay parked there for free and hang out on the beach! Free coffee downstairs in the morning AND my room had a fridge, microwave, dishes and silverware! The cleanliness of the hotel makes us for the fact that it is not brand new. I will stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Its Acceptable for the Price”
Reviews.Author: rfuchs0917
Reviews.Content: My husband and I took our son here to kick off his summer break. Our friends came along too. The room was quoted @ $74 per night, but on checkout I was charged $84. So, just be sure they are charging what you were quoted. I read online that this hotel had bed bugs, but unfortunately I read about it AFTER I booked. The posing was older and I couldnt decide if it was just an angry person trying to harm the hotel. So, I called and let them know my concern. They said, come on down and inspect the place. If it isnt up to par then you dont stay and dont pay! That was acceptable to me. On arrival I did just that. Flashlight and all I gave the room a complete inspection and NO BED BUGS!! I was very relieved. Still this is an older hotel and as such has hot hallways, slow elevators, a small in hotel lounge and restarant. Nothing overly fancy about this inn which was OK for us because we intended to stay on the beach! The are right on the beach with a nice pool area (NEEDS MORE SHADED AREAS!!!) and very small bar outside. On the beach you can rent chairs and an umbrella for $30 the entire day. That was SO NICE!! Anyways, overall it was acceptable for the money. I think I need something just slightly BETTER for next time though.

Reviews.Title: “Listen to the Reviews”
Reviews.Author: OnTheGo0620
Reviews.Content: Bates motel, Jr...I am an appreciative person, but I must say that I have had better. I've paid less and had better. The price was reasonable, but the hotel is old. On the outside, it's grimy looking. At first sight, the inside is ok, but if you are a neat freak like myself and look closely, it is dirty. The elevators are VERY slow. Each floor is VERY humid. The room keys are difficult to use. You have to finesse them. The kitchenette was laughable. They said there was a stovetop, no stovetop just a microwave, plates, cups, sink, coffee maker, cutting board, flatware, dish soap, mini fridge, and some kitchen towels. The DVD player worked half the time. Again, you had to finesse it. The windows were dirty so it was difficult to enjoy the view while looking at dirt on the window. No balconies at all. I felt like I was in a prison, as I could not even open a window. The AC was good and cold. The bed was ok, but don't look behind it because you will see crumbs, dirt, and all sorts of things. The pillows are VERY soft so if you are used to a firm pillow then bring your own. The complimentary breakfast consisted of OJ, coffee, cereal, and doughnuts. Again, laughable. The ladies at the front desk were moody. All in all, I am grateful that I had a place to stay because the experience was awesome, but I would not subject anyone to that kind of experience with this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT PLAN A STAY WITH THIS HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: QueenB40
Reviews.Content: Not only did they misrepresent their accomodations - but upon arrival and realizing that 5 people couldn't possibly sleep in the room they had "bait and switch" reserved in my name - they refused to do anything at all to help my family and I. We were promised a 2-bedroom, 2-bath with full kitchen and living room. We were traveling with 3 teenage girls and 2 adults. What they put us in had 2 double beds and no privacy for anyone. It also smelled like smoke and the furnishings were outdated, dirty and generally not what was represented in their photographs online. There was no manager on duty supposedly and in the inept front desk people wouldn't even attempt to contact one on my behalf. They did absolutely NOTHING to help us - and actually made the situation worse. The beach accesibility was nice, but given the poor customer service and misrepresentation - I'd trade the view for what I was promised any day!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, and Nice Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: yellachick
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed my stay at this motel. Upon checking in me and my friend recieved a free travel mug, and received a bunch of free samples such as shampoo and toothpaste to name a few, upon checking out. The beds and pillows were super comfortable. The only thing that I didnt like about the motel is that when I got there (I pre-booked through Expedia) I had to give them my card for a $50 deposit, which is returned when checking out as long as no damage was done, and there is a fee of about $14 you must pay upon checking out for dvd rentals and something else, these fees are charged whether you rent dvds or not. Overall I was satisfied with my choice to stay here and would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: juancho64
Reviews.Content: Excellent food & outstanding service at the restaurant and at the pool bar.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hospitality experience ever!”
Reviews.Author: rvwer2011
Reviews.Content: When we got there the front desk people did not even acknowledge us and were very rude. We were supposed to have an Ocean view room but got a street and another hotels view. When we enquired about that we were told that if we tried looking at the far left side of our window we would see the ocean! There were other two parties complaining about the same issue as as. The room was DIRTY and smelly...... The hotel should invest in good quality customer service.....smiling front desk faces instead of those grumpy agents (evening shift) will go a long way.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, perfect beach view, room”
Reviews.Author: 2kayak
Reviews.Content: There during college spring break to meet daughter - crowded with kids but had tight security night and day, breakfast only cereal and donuts, service wonderful for anything we needed/asked for, didn't like paying extra for mandatory dvd rental. Ocean view from room, had microwave and fridge, love the pillows! Has a breakfast restaurant, not expensive, and also small evening club/restaurant. Free parking.

Reviews.Title: “The Roach Hotel, and I have pics to prove it”
Reviews.Author: Nucknfuts
Reviews.Content: Worst hotel stay ever! Looked good on internet, should have listened to the bad reviews. I don't know who would give this place a good review, except smelly trailer trash smokers. First off, it's old and broken down, lobby stinks, rooms stink like, not sure what, old stale coffee mixed with smoke maybe. We were totally paranoid of roaches and tore the beds down to look but none were found at night. In the morning I saw one on the wall just above the bed. I took a picture and showed the front desk while trying to escape this pit and they gave me a whole $17 discount, but after adding several hidden charges I still paid over $110. They did let me out of my second night and I went to the Holiday Inn next door and had the best hotel I've ever stayed at for $130. Run away, right next door to the Holiday Inn, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: “RIP OFF”
Reviews.Author: nala54
Reviews.Content: The trip there was nice. When we arrived the desk clerk was nice. We were suppose to get an efficiency but when we got to the room, lets just say it was far from appealing. For the difference in price we elected to stay in the regular room. We walked into the room and when I turned on the air, this moldy smell came out. Now, my three grandchildren have asthma.( 11,10 and 8) I figured it may be because the air hasn't been turned on for awhile and the smell would go away so we notified the desk clerk and we went to the pool It was slimey so I slipped and hurt my toe going down the stairs of the pool.Now I should of reported it but I'm not like that. If I had known what I know now I would have. The room also was far from clean. I told the children to make sure they wore their slippers because the rugs were sssssssoooooo dirty. The internet is not free. There was a charge of 5.95 and that was for internet and movies for the two nights we were there. OK no biggie .The big problem came when we left. We checked out and went to breakfast (somewhere else because the breakfast there was a joke)and I thought I left some toiletrys there so we went back within 1 1/2 hrs. We went up to the room and it had already been cleaned. The maid and head maid said they found nothing in the room. OK no big thing. I ended up finding them in another bag later on. We arrived home and the next day I checked my credit card and there was a charge of $266.25 that I could not figure out from the hotel. I called the booking agent. She called me back and said it was because of smoking in the room. OK BUT I DON'T SMOKE !!!!!! My grendchildren don't smoke either. I called the manager several times (Scott Hendricks) and when I finally got ahold of him he said he had to check with the head maid. OK. No call back so I called again several times and when I talked to him he said there was a heavy smell of smoke reported by the maid and he wasn't 100% sure but he thinks there was cigarette packs found in the garbage. Again I don't smoke !!! I explained that to Scott and he said "This happens all the time". I tried to explain to him that I don't smoke (again) My grandchildren don't smoke either so how could that of happened.I told Scott I returned to the hotel 11/2 hours later to see if I left some things and the room was already cleaned and NO-ONE mentioned anything like that to me. So here it is months later and I never seen my $266.25. Amagine charging that much money for nothing. So whether or not you smoke if your number is drawn for the smoking charge YOU WILL get hit with it. Unless you can go back to take them to small claims court, you will never see that money again!!!!!!!!!!!!! MY booking agent will never use them again, she knows I don't smoke I will NEVER set foot in that establishment again even if it was for free. I don't want to be in their lottery

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME”
Reviews.Author: awilliams33
Reviews.Content: They had great service, the place was very clean and big. I would def stay here again and most likely will!

Reviews.Title: “Yuck”
Reviews.Author: bmuntz
Reviews.Content: This place stinks like smoke and its says its non smoking. There was a nasty bug in my fridge...a roach! Good location but not worth the fear of reaches nesting in your ear.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel experience was better than we expected it to be”
Reviews.Author: Gina039
Reviews.Content: Although our visit to Daytona was not for a vacation but to see an elderly family member who had fallen and was in rehab, we thought we would try to find something on the beach so we could take morning walks on it. Based on the reviews we had read, pictures of the hotel we had seen and the low rate offered, we expected the hotel to be at best, a 2-star hotel. We were delightfully surprised to find that the hotel was better than we expected it to be. Although we knew the hotel was full, when we checked in, we were upgraded to a deluxe ocean view room and we really did look directly out onto the ocean from our room. The rate included a continental breakfast but the hotel did also have a restaurant that offered full breakfast choices. There was also a bar area that served limited food items and drinks in the evening, Tuesday - Saturday. In addition, the pool was heated, there were laundery facilities in the hotel, parking was under cover, there was a nice sun deck on the 2nd floor, the towels were not paper thin, the room was a decent size, the beds were comfortable and the room had a small kitchenette in it. The staff was very friendly. My ownly disappointment was, there are no balconies at this property.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel experience ever”
Reviews.Author: jennsyn
Reviews.Content: We had three different rooms over a 2 night stay. The first room smelled like mold so we switched into another room. Nothing worked in the second room but atleast it didn't stink. They sent someone up to fix the DVD. He couldn't but said that he would get us another one. He never returned. This seems to be common, the maid also did not show up to clean the room and no I did not leave the do not disturb sign on the door. Even at rat-trap motels, the maid shows up. I would have given it no stars if I was allowed.

Reviews.Title: “RUN FROM THIS PLACE”
Reviews.Author: GAPeach79
Reviews.Content: No bedspreads or comforters on the bed just 2 flat sheets. Pillows that were flat like a bag of cotton balls, I've seen more fluff in a maxi pad. I'm not sure they have house keeping b/c the rooms were nasty. There were smashed bugs behind the glass of the framed art....who does that? All the furniture was cracked and chipped. Chair cushions were black from being dirty and not being cleaned....makes you real grossed out at sleeping in thier beds. Brown spots on the walls that looked to be there a while and have not been painted. The mini fridge was missing racks and looked like the door had been kicked in. The microwave was sitting on top of the mini fridge and was to big to be doing so therefore it was handing off the top of the fridge. The shower liner they had put in over the old stuff obviously wasn't installed correctly because it would pop and give under your feet. There was a fabric shower curtian but no liner. The a/c in the room worked good but the hallways were extremely hot and smelled really strong of old mildew carpet. The elevators scared me, they shook so much the doors would crack open and you can see the markings of the floors as you passed. The continental breakfast was a joke, don't expect them to refill either. Even if its an hour before cut off, if the 2 choice of cereal and a few pastries was gone you were just out of luck. However you could go to the restuarant and pay for the breakfast which was also a joke. The guest guide said the pool was heated, we were here end of Oct first of Nov....pool was so cold that my oldest son was literally turning blue and I couldn't even get in past my knees before I turned around and we left. The fitness room consists of 3 pieces of equipment in a really cramped room. The parking deck was small, poorly designed and hard to get around in. The vending machines charge you $1.25 for a 12oz can of coke. The ice machines, well lets just say bring your own ice. The one close to our floor was cracked, the visible air filter was dirty and the bolts were so rusted it was all over the tray under the ice dispenser opening. Not sure if I would trust that the ice is clean and bacteria free. The only positive things I can say about this place is it was right on the beach, the a/c worked and the wireless internet worked wonderful but you can get these 3 things at a much better place as well and you will be happier.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: gskissimmee
Reviews.Content: Great FD staff. Penhouse was clean and stocked. Great Customer Service.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!!!!”
Reviews.Author: lorizanni08
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had planned a vacation to stay in Daytona Beach, FL and chose Oceanside Inn as our hotel. BIG MISTAKE!! We checked in put our bags in our room and went out for dinner, etc. We got back rather late, so we were ready for bed. As we were getting ready for bed I pulled the comforter down and there was a DEAD ROACH on our pillow. After noticing the DEAD ROACH I started looking around and found a trail of ANTS by our bed. We complained and all they did was change all the bedding and supposedly cleaned behind the bed, nightstands etc. Well needless to say we still had ANTs. If you walked down the hallway you would see a roach scoot across the floor. Once we checked out we asked if we could get a discount or at least a one night stay free as we were there for 3 days. We paid $125 a night for this ROACH MOTEL. The manager stated that he could only give us $20 off the amenities fee. We NEVER even used the pool. NEVER we will stay in this hotel again. THANKS FOR A HORRIBLE START TO OUR VACATION.

Reviews.Title: “Literally a roach motel”
Reviews.Author: darkkan
Reviews.Content: I booked this after reading glowing reviews about it online. We were on our way to Disneyworld and needed a place to stay for the night, preferably on the beach. I was able to get the room for $60 and it was supposed to "comfortably sleep 5". The rate was seasonal, so I thought we were getting an off season bargain. So, we get there lafter dark after passing through anything resembling a touristy part of Daytona. The businesses around it had bars on the windows and I was desparately hoping for valet parking. After unloading our own luggage and parking the car in a dark and scary parking lot, we went in to find a roach scrambling across the lobby floor. I hear someone gasp and say "Ewww a roach!". The desk clerk, who seemed to be irritated to even be working, goes "It's not a roach, it's a palmetto bug". Regardless, it was gross. Our room was tiny, cramped and the furniture was stained and old. The foldout bed to "comfortably sleep 5" was an extra $15 and would barely fit anywhere in the room. Because we were so far away from anything and there was no hotel restaruant, we had to order pizza for dinner. We were weary of going anywhere outside the hotel on foot at night due to the scary neighborhood. I would say to stick wtih a chain hotel 2 miles down the street and pay the extra money to be closer to something to do and a place to eat.

Reviews.Title: “Not Bad For The Price!”
Reviews.Author: ramprat61
Reviews.Content: Stayed there for a week , some stuff need to be worked on , but when is free breakfast is cereal and coffee, juice and donuts, if you want a complete breakfast try a dinner a couple of bloacks away all you can eat for a very nice price. overal if you want to pay more for probably less appealing place, be my guess, I will be back here next year... beach is nice, nice salt water pool. need improving on the parking lightning. Alex

Reviews.Title: “Not what was expected from the Internet”
Reviews.Author: amybeth470
Reviews.Content: This hotel was definitely not worth the going rate. While located in a good spot on the beach, we had nothing but problems upon check in. It took approximately 25 minutes to check in because there was a line and the front desk staff were moving in slow motion. Upon check in, I was informed of additional mandatory charges for so-called "free internet" and DVD rentals (regardless of whether we wanted DVDs). They also required a hold on our credit card in the amount of $25 per pool towel. For a family of 4, this meant we had $100 less to spend on our vacation. The room was in disrepair. Our "deluxe" room was supposed to be an upgrade from the "standard" room, but we came to realize that deluxe translated to a toaster in the room. The furniture was old and tacky. The door did not shut tightly and the bolt did not work at all. We were told maintenance would fix the issue while we were out, but found that after returning late in the evening, it still did not work properly and maintenance was gone for the night. We resigned to pushing a chair up against the door at night for security. We obviously did not feel safe at all. The paint on the ceiling and walls was chipped. We were moved the next night to a nicer room. This room's lock worked, but the toilet seat was loose. The parking was a small covered unit next to the hotel, parking was tight, not well-lit and not secure. The continental breakfast consisted of only two types of cold cereal, coffee, orange juice and store bought mini doughnuts. We were very disappointed with this hotel and would not recommend it to others. The quality was comparable to a Super 8, but a Super 8 would have been much cheaper.

Reviews.Title: “Won't be staying here with our next trip to Daytona Beach...”
Reviews.Author: no-ocean-manitoba
Reviews.Content: The beach location is terrific but we were disappointed when we first checked into our room as it did not appear to have been vacuumed & the tables were not wiped. There was food on the table by the window and white powder was also on the floor around both chairs & on the table. There was also a huge beetle-like bug on the carpet at the foot of the bed which terrified my kids but thankfully, it was dead. The breakfast in the morning was sufficient but lacking fresh fruit or yogurt. (the man working in that area was very friendly). The hallway on our floor had areas of sand/grime which was there both days and needed to be vacuumed as well. As mentioned, the location is excellent but the concept of cleanliness does need some attention.

Reviews.Title: “HORRIBLE HORRIBLE HORRIBLE”
Reviews.Author: beresara
Reviews.Content: I've never been as disappointed with a hotel stay as I was this Labor Day weekend. To begin with, its locations is less than appealing. On the water, yes; however, it is a few miles away from the more populated area. The room was nice from the look of things, fair sized bathroom and room, but when we went to sleep on the beds the first night we quickly realized that they sagged in the middle, making it almost impossible to get comfortable, let alone fall asleep. Next morning, we were met at the hotel by my sister in law and her husband, who live in Daytona, who brought along the family dog. A small maltese whom is a big part of the family. When we were through with our relaxing beach day, we walked in through the lobby to get to the elevators ( which shake and will make any person rethink taking the stairs). There is a rude older lady who works at the front desk who tried to charge us $250 for the dog, which was not even staying with us. This lady was very unwilling to work with us and made it impossible to talk to, so we notified the manager ( who was very nice ) and fixed the situation. To wrap things up, to have your room cleaned COSTS MONEY, to get towels COSTS MONEY. their ""CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST" consists of donuts, cereal, 1 juice and coffee. across from this tiny area which can seat maybe 20 hotel guests, is a "restaurant" where you can pay for other breakfast items. the hotel bar was not opened once while we were there. Parking is a headache. one of the nights we got home around 1130 and had to park on the corner where the dumpster is because their was nothing left. the front desk has NOOOO CONDITIONER which is almost absurd for a hotel on the beach. I would not have thought twice about staying at a motel 6 compared to this dump. with as many other hotels as their are in daytona beach, STAY SOMEWHERE ELSE !!

Reviews.Title: “Best Place To Stay in Daytona Beach Florida”
Reviews.Author: crash55
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Daytona Beach since 1972 & stayed in alot of places varrious times of the year.From the time my daughter & I arrived, I was amazed.I called 3 days before to ask for a earlier check-in they said they would try their best.Well we got there at 1:15pm & we walked in said my name & they had our Beach Front room ready.The whole place was better than expected,the complete staff treated everyone as if you were someone very important,The whole layout is perfect,the pool great The Beach area you feel very secure,there is a lifegaurd right in front,the cabana's were very cheap but extremly good.The rooms are extra large the beds were very comfortable,We were there for 5days in that time I never heard 1 guest complain about anything.I rate this a must stay 10 plus THANK YOU OCEANSIDE Your the best & made the end of my vacation perfect

Reviews.Title: “Why so many negative reviews?”
Reviews.Author: Margo9999
Reviews.Content: C'mon, all the negative reviews? Keep in mind this is a condo hotel property...where the owners who care about their property (rooms) work with the management to keep the place nice, and management is more then willing to bend over backwards to assist those staying here. The unit we stayed in (407) had a brand new kitchenette, with white cupboards and a real countertop, nice new furniture, flat screen tv...compared this to another kitchenette room with an older set up, were told by management that this room as well as several other rooms had just been renovated...the place is clean, the pool and beach are great for the price...I don't believe some of the other reviews...

Reviews.Title: “Hotel from Hell”
Reviews.Author: livingthelifeParis
Reviews.Content: We checked in. Paid for upgraded room on top floor. 1/3 of the carpet in the room was soaked. They told us to put down towels. We were stuck in the room that night and had several bags had become wet before we noticed the carpet. They changed our room to a regular down graded room for the same price the next day. Wi Fi only worked in our room OCCASIONALLY if you sat on the toilet. .. . .no where else. We were told it was only guaranteed in the Lobby (which is not what it says on their website). If you used THEIR computer in the lobby there was an additional $4 charge. Bed was terrible. . . .sagged in the middle. Continental breakfast consisted of donuts, cereal, juice and coffee. You had to pay for anything else. There is an additional $5.95 daily charge for amenity type things like free long distance and dvd rental. There was a poor selection of dvd's and most that we saw were scratched. That didn't make a huge difference to us because our tv didn't even work until the third day. And ...when we checked out . . .we noticed that they had also charged us $20 for long distance charges (supposed to have unlimited long distance in the $5.95 charge) and $50 for a room upgrade that we never got. We stayed here 5 nights. Several of these days our rooms were not cleaned and we even had to request soap. The only reason we didn't move was because we didn't want to have to move all of our stuff AGAIN after we had already had to switch rooms once. I heard many other guests complaining while we were there. . .. ..especially about the wi fi and wet carpet. There are lots of nice places to stay in Daytona . . . . .don't waste your money on this dump.

Reviews.Title: “BED BUGS - NEVER AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: brad298
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for two nights. We noticed a bug crawling on the bed. After checking the bed skirt we noticed several more bed bugs. Checked out of the hotel immediately filed a complaint with Flordia's Health Department.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Bed! Old Hotel”
Reviews.Author: swonderfull
Reviews.Content: We went for a weekend trip and the rate was not bad, but gee, charge me more and give me an updated hotel. We stayed there because friends suggested the hotel. Would I stay again, probably not. Mattress was old and sunken in and sheets kept coming off.

Reviews.Title: “DUMP!!!”
Reviews.Author: daytonabeachvisitor
Reviews.Content: After I arrived and checked in the first thing I noticed was that the staff was rude as hell! When I opened the door to my room it smelled like mold and mildew. It almost knocked me back out the door it smelled so bad. Later I noticed water leaking down the wall and the carpet was wet. Reported this to the manager on duty and he simply said we are booked and I can't give you another room, soory sir. The second day one out of only two elevators broke down! which made it very time consuming to get from my floor to the ground floor or viceversa. The complimentary breakfast was a joke! Parking was a big hastle! Location was terrible! The only good thing I can say about this hotel is that it is on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great All-around experience”
Reviews.Author: Unctarheelz
Reviews.Content: Overall the Oceanside Inn was a great hotel. The room and amenities were great. The staff provided us with everything we needed and asked for. The room was clean. The location is great, right on the beach and just minutes away from anything you would want to do at Daytona. We enjoyed the free unlimited DVD rentals. The only thing we didn't like was the "free" continental breakfast which consisted of cereal and doughnuts. If you expect anything hot for breakfast, expect to pay at least $3.00 extra per person. Other than that, our experience was great!

Reviews.Title: “Room was great-large bathroom-Definitly a great place for the price!!”
Reviews.Author: swtgretchen
Reviews.Content: My fiance and I ended up staying at this hotel at the last minute because our friends stayed for the weekend and we didn't want to go back home. We paid at the last minute (5pm) $100 for one night, which is pretty decent for the beach. The bathrooms were huge, the bed was very comfy, the room was very clean, and the pool was nice being salt water and open very late. **Only Dislikes**The Elevators are VERY slow AND we decided after bar hopping all night, we would get a hot breakfast and for go the continental. We ate at the little resteraunt they have across from the free breakfast (in the hotel) and it was just awful!! My fiance actually got up and walked out as to not imbarrass me and start yelling. Overall we enjoyed our stay and I actually tried to stay there again this past weekend but they were all booked up!

Reviews.Title: “Did not stay”
Reviews.Author: tmstafford
Reviews.Content: Booked a room in this hotel on line. Site showed completely different scenario than was here. NO BALCONY?!!? Service staff was rude! We went to our room and it was not what we wanted and they charged us for a night anyway -- we had only been here a half hour. Really not a good experience and it is not for those who are looking to enjoy the beach, the view and a comfortable room. Beware of websites, they often don't tell the whole story.

Reviews.Title: “Worse Daytona Vacation ever”
Reviews.Author: ahadizadeh
Reviews.Content: Worse Daytona Vacation EVER If the there was a negative star I would have used instead. Where shall I begin? First of all this must be the only hotel in the entire Daytona Beach that doesn’t have balcony. Trust me if you are traveling to a beach you would appreciate having a balcony. Second the condensation from air conditioner in our instead of flowing outside kept leaking on the carpet inside and the entire room floor was soaked. I tried notifying the hotel service. They told me nothing they can do and it’s like this when it rains. So beside smelly and wet carpet room the hotel service doesn’t care who from the street uses their facilities. We noticed that people who drive on the beach and park in front of the hotel walk up to the hotel and use the showers and restrooms and even the swimming pool. I don’t have any problem with sharing but when I have to stay in like forever so I can use the services that I paid for it makes me upset. Also the hotel has 9 floors and one of the elevators was broken the entire time so imagine constantly waiting for an elevator. The pool rules are simple, no personal coolers, no smoking, and there use to be pool hours. Well what we saw was people bringing their own personal cools by the pool and smoking, Between the smell of alcohol and cigarette smoke you cannot enjoy the pool side. Over all this was not a good Daytona experience for us and we do come to Daytona every forth. I would never ever stay at this location.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE!!!! Dirty & unkept. NEVER AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: awsumgator
Reviews.Content: I was sooo dissappointed. **No Balconies**A/C didn't get cold & VERY noisy,**Kitchen was a mini fridge, broken coffeepot, microwave. Plates and cups. **NO WIFI !! I tried for 3 days and could never get on, called front desk many times, they even reset router to no avail.**HALLS smelled of smoke, the carpet was filthy. **Bathroom had some unknown dried spots of something on the walls.**TV remote didn't work, they "reprogrammed"it, then it soon went out and the 2nd one soon went out also. It was horrible. We left a day early. There are so many much NICER hotels on the strip (Perry's, Tropical Winds, Coral Beach, Islander.) The board walk was 3 mi. away but saw beautiful fireworks from pier and from race track.

Reviews.Title: “great cccomodations and service”
Reviews.Author: charley1942
Reviews.Content: The motel in general was great and so were the staff. the only negative was a lighting problem in one of the elevators which caused a backup in getting to the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Everything you would need in a hotel, but without the big price”
Reviews.Author: jheckmann
Reviews.Content: We got a great deal on this hotel for the weekend. From the outside it does not look as great as some of the neighboring hotels, but on the inside it is very nice. The rooms themselves aren't real modern, but are nice. We had two double beds and they were comfy. You get a DVD player to watch movies on, and there is a DVD rental box in the lobby. There was a mini fridge and there is a small kitchen, along with plates, cups, and utensils. The rooftop garden is actually on the 2nd floor, but it gave a safe place for our 16 month old to run around under our supervision. There is also a place to lay out up there, so my 16 year old daughter and I got some sun up there. The pool is right down by the outdoor bar, which provides food and drinks from noon. The beach area was not too crowded out in front, which I was glad of, especially with a little one. For breakfast, there is a complementary breakfast in one room, but if you want a full breakfast, there is a small dining area across the hall. Overall, we had a great time and enjoyed ourselves. We will return to this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “OK stay”
Reviews.Author: gfree123
Reviews.Content: We travelled with my two young children (7 & 3). The hotel was just ok. We really liked the large salt water pool, and being on the beach. We also liked the idea of having a DVD player and a DVD dispenser (much like RedBox) where you could get different movies. Unfortunately, our playerdidn't work too well, but maintenance came the next day and fixed it. The beds were pretty hard and uncomfortable, and only had 2 full size beds, instead of queen size. The continental breakfast was only adequate. They had raisen bran, plain Cheerios and doughnuts every day. They did have breakfast that you could buy for fairly reasonable rates. The towel rack in the bathroom kept falling off the wall everytime you got a towel off of it (and don't tell me they weren't aware, because the housekeeping kept putting it back together and hanging towels on it), so that was aggravating. All in all, the best part about the hotel was the pool and being on the beach, and we probably would not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: FoxeyLemon
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Oceanside Inn for 10 days. We had a few legitimate issues with our room but Robert, in maintenance, bent over backwards to get us a new room. He was caring and made sure with the front desk that we were moved to another room. The front desk was very accommodating also. Housekeeping was great.
